thread.title: Spagna colloca 1,31 mld titoli 3 e 9 mesi, tassi negativi in lieve rialzo Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Spagna colloca 1,31 mld titoli 3 e 9 mesi, tassi negativi in lieve rialzo Bond |
text: MADRID, February 20 (Reuters) - Spain announced the following results at Tuesday's Treasury bill auction . (Amounts bid, allocated in millions of euros) ISSUE YIELD PREVIOUS PRICE PREVIOUS BID ALLOCATED 3-month -0.507 -0.526 100.109 100.103 1,908 310 9-month -0.444 -0.473 100.329 100.342 4,665 1,000 The bid-to-cover ratio on the 3-month bill was 6.2 versus 5.2 at the last auction. The bid-to-cover ratio on the 9-month bill was 4.7 versus 3.8 at the last auction. For further information, click on and . (Reporting by Madrid Newsroom) Keywords: SPAIN DEBT/
